Free Counseling, Top University, Low Tuition Fee, No Donation, All Document Support.', canonical: 'https://www.mbbsadmissionsinabroad.com/mbbs-admission-in-bangladesh-for-indian-students/', meta: { charset: 'utf-8', name: { keywords: 'MBBS Admission in Bangladesh' } } }; return (

MBBS in Bangladesh

MBBS in Bangladesh is a good choice for to study for Indians. Medical Course is costliest course in the whole world wide, and it is really hard for middle class people to pursue the course. But MBBS in Bangladesh offers you with low-cost for Indian Citizens. Students have to clear the criteria given by the Bangladesh government for an admission of MBBS in Bangladesh and according to that they can choose the best university to pursue MBBS. MBBS in Bangladesh opportunity is going to increase in future.

  • Index
  • About Bangladesh
  • Why Study MBBS in Bangladesh
  • Benefits of Studying MBBS in Bangladesh for Indian Students 2020

  • Advice/Procedure to Study MBBS in Bangladesh

About Bangladesh

Bangladesh is originated in the east of India and it is a south Asian country. The country with greenery and backwaters. The know largest river in the world The Ganges, The Brahmaputra, and the Meghna rivers flow through Bangladesh and it is largest delta in the world. The Sundarbans which is largest forest in the southern coast of Bangladesh and the home of Royal Tigers is shared by India too.
The geography is shared between three regions. The air temperature has been recorded 0 degree Celsius. Bangladesh is warm and humid during monsoon and the rain is expected by October.

Why MBBS in Bangladesh

MBBS in Bangladesh for Indian Students is the best option because of the following reasons:

  • Some of the top MBBS college in Bangladesh, 25% of seats have been reserved for Indian Students and yea there quite few chances for Indians to pursue MBBS in Bangladesh.
  • tudents does not have to pay their fee for their course if they belong to SAARC Nation, so that they can pay their fee to stay.
  • MBBS degree from the Bangladesh medical college is recognized by the MCI (Medical Council of India)
  • Travel to the Bangladesh is much easier and even economical than traveling to other countries.
  • The local language in Bangladesh is German but there are top medical colleges that provide MBBS education in English language.
  • The cost of living is quite favorable for Indian students as there are excellent boarding and lodging provided by Bangladesh medical college with the availability of Indian food.
  • Bangladesh is extremely safe for Indian students and the environment is also safe.
  • There is no requirement to pay any donation fee or capitation fee for taking admission to MBBS in Bangladesh.

Benefits of Studying MBBS in Bangladesh for Indian Students 2020

Bangladesh is the best place for Indian students to study MBBS because of the following benefits:

  • It is easy to get MBBS admission in Bangladesh medical college because of the simple procedure for Indian students.
  • There is no requirement to clear any English proficiency test for pursuing MBBS in Bangladesh.
  • The MBBS degree acquired from any Bangladesh medical college is valid and these degrees are approved by the Medical Council of India.
  • MBBS in Bangladesh fees is reasonable as compared to Indian Medical Colleges.
  • MBBS in Bangladesh integrate theoretical and practical learning in such a way that students are taught in the most effective way possible.

Eligibility Criteria for MBBS in Bangladesh

The eligibility criteria of the students who want to pursue MBBS in Bangladesh are as follows:

  • The students should have science in their 12th standard and should have an aggregate of 50% marks in physics, chemistry, and Biology.
  • They should be at least 17 years of age to take admission to Bangladesh medical college / Universities.
  • They should also qualify for the NEET exam with passing marks to apply for MBBS in Bangladesh.
  • They should have English subject in their higher secondary.
  • They must not be more than 25 years of age.

Top Universities to Study MBBS in Bangladesh

  • Medical University of Vienna.
  • Medical University of Graz.
  • Medical University of Innsbruck.
  • Paracelsus Private Medical University.

Requirements for MBBS Admission in Bangladesh 2020-2021

The necessary documents for taking admission to MBBS in Bangladesh are the following:

  • A complete filled application form with all accurate details.
  • Original and photocopies of Passport.
  • Birth certificates and other mandatory certificates must be submitted to the concerned authority.
  • Passport size (3cmX4cm) photographs.
  • Original and a photocopy of mark sheets of both 10th & 12th standard
  • A scorecard of NEFT (if required)
  • Transfer certificate from the previous school
  • Leaving certificate from the concerned school
  • A certificate of code of conduct must be submitted
  • The bank copy of guardians must be submitted which indicates that they have sufficient funds to pay the fees to Bangladesh medical college.
  • A medical checkup certificate is also essential

MBBS Fees in Bangladesh 2020-2021

The fees structure for the Indian students studying MBBS in Bangladesh will range anywhere around 726 Euros per semester.

MBBS in Bangladesh Advice for Indian Students

The following are the advices for the Indian students in Bangladesh:

  • The students should always be cautious of their surroundings.
  • The Indian Students are advised to apply in the Bangladesh Medical College within the time
  • They must avoid the company of dangerous people.
  • They should not stay outside late in the night.

Pros and Cons of Studying MBBS in Bangladesh

Every country has its pros and cons that can benefit as well as effect Indian students who seek admission to MBBS in Bangladesh. But Bangladesh has more benefits as compared to other countries with very fewer cons: The Indian students will get to experience the knowledge and the understanding of different cultures and traditions followed by the people of Bangladesh. The medical degrees awarded to students are recognized by the MCI which enables them to work practically anywhere in the world. Each MCI approved Bangladesh Medical college provide hostel accommodation to the Indian students with Indian food. The climate conditions in Bangladesh often become problematic for some students to adjust well. The local language in Bangladesh is German so the students might feel the language as a barrier outside the university campus.

VISA Procedure for MBBS in Bangladesh

The students need to fill up the online application form with the right details all the required documents. The students then will receive offer letter from the university that they have applied to study MBBS in Bangladesh. They need to pay the MBBS in Bangladesh fees and then they have to apply for the visa and once they receive the student VISA card, they can book the tickets!

FAQ's to Study MBBS in Bangladesh
Which university is the best options to study MBBS in Bangladesh for Indian Students?

Almost every Bangladesh Medical College provides the best quality of education. The best Bangladesh Medical College for Indian Students is as follows:

  1. Medical University of Vienna.
  2. Medical University of Graz.
  3. Medical University of Innsbruck.
  4. Paracelsus Private Medical University.

 Is an MBBS in Bangladesh a Good Option?

Studying MBBS in Bangladesh is one of the good options because Bangladesh is well known for its quality and affordable medical education and Bangladesh has one of the best Medical colleges.

 How it is beneficial to study MBBS in Bangladesh for Indian students?

Indian Medical students can easily pursue MBBS in Bangladesh as they can get hostels accommodation with Indian food which makes them comfortable in adjusting to this beautiful country. MBBS in Bangladesh is recognized worldwide as the each Bangladesh Medical College is acknowledged by the MCI.

 Can a medical student study MBBS in Bangladesh at affordable fee structure?

The tuition fee in Bangladesh Medical College is reasonable so, it is quite worthy & cost-effective for Indian students to study MBBS in Bangladesh.

 What are the admission requirements for an MBBS in Bangladesh?

  • The students should have science in their 12th standard and should have an aggregate of 50% marks in physics, chemistry, and Biology.
  • The students should be at least 17 years of age to take admission to Bangladesh Medical College/ Universities.
  • The students should also qualify for the NEET exam with passing marks to apply for MBBS in Bangladesh.
  • The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
  • The students must not be more than 25 years of age.

 What is the NEET minimum marks to join an MBBS in Bangladesh 2020?

The NEET minimum marks to join an MBBS in Bangladesh 2020 is 50 percentile.
